tags.name: textview
tags.content: Plain text output â€” tag contents are shown, tags themselves are hidden for smooth reading.

tags.name: tagview
tags.content: View with symbolic tag syntax (`#s.super#t.tag#`), useful for debugging or editing files.

tags.name: satelliteview
tags.content: Graph-like layout: center node is the selected file, all cross/nested tags orbit as linked document badges with expandable bursts.
